app_descript:
Deus Ex GO

Brief: Deus Ex GO sweeps you into a captivating turn-based puzzle adventure set against a futuristic backdrop. Playing as the iconic protagonist Adam Jensen, you'll engage in a cerebral game of cat and mouse, using strategy, stealth, and cybernetic augmentations to solve challenging puzzles and unravel a deep narrative mystery.
